question: Narendra Jha, the noted film and television actor passed away. He was native to which state?
explanation: Narendra Jha (55), the noted film and television actor, has passed away in Nashik, Maharashtra on March 14, 2018. He was born in Madhubani, Bihar. He began his small screen journey with Mandira Bediâ€™s Shanti and went on to model in TV ads. He is best known for his performances in films such as \"Raees\", \"Kaabil\", \"Mohenjo Daro\" and \"Haider\".
